document_data.name: Crommor's
document_data.mainbody: '''Crommor's''' was an [[inn]] and tavern found in the city of [[Saerloon]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Location: Crommor's was located near Saerloon's docks.
document_data.Activities: This establishment tended to attract unsavory folk. Though the accommodations were fair and the prices were cheap, brawls were a frequent occurrence here.
